sentence: The only staff that was friendly was the housekeeper and the server at the buffet
Excellent casino and rooms great staff
I will definitely return because of the level of service I received
The housekeeping staff on the 27th floor was awesome
Staff was super nice and helpfulThe keys got deactivated by the slightest thing phones purses and credit cards
The staff was always courteous and we had no issues while there
Great location comfortable beds and very welcoming staff
We arrived at noon and were greeted with a friendly desk clerk
We ordered room service one morning for breakfast and they arrived promptly and the food was excellent
Great customers service on the very busy fight weekend
did I mention the customer service sucks
However the receptionist talked to a manager and ended up giving us an upgrade
There was a mix up with our room and the concierge immediately upgraded our room
He started one of the agents at the front desk will assist you so you need to stand in line
Wait staff dressed very scantily can not be very sanitary 5 stars
Oh well I will say that the housekeeping staff does an excellent job and guest services did respond to my requests for a new remote and an extra blanket
We enjoyed our room but did not get maid service the first or second day and we did leave the room for most of the day with our service sign on
The gift shop employee made me and my friends uncomfortable
staff did relocate when asked
I went to the desk and she moved me to another room
As usual the VIP check in staff are wonderful friendly and willing to make acomodations if needed
Friendly staff around the hotel
Room overlooking strip was very nice excelant beds valet and bellhops very quick check in slower but ok got there early and checked in went back later to another line to pick up keys
I finally just went downstairs and asked the front desk for a coffee maker
At 80 years old this was our Moms first time here and she has done nothing but rave about the services and the acomodations
The attendant then asked my father in law for his i d and he gave him his military i d
I called to customer service to clean my room and bring towel sooner because I need to get ready for a show
The room had only one luggage rack so we immediately called “ Guest Services ” to have another one delivered
nice staff lil bit nickle and dime you to death
The staff bend over backwards to accommodate anything and everything you may want or need
I called the front desk and the gal on the phone could actually hear it on her end
Concierge in line advising everyone to check in online
service available at weird times and the hotel nickels and dimes their guest for everything especially parking
I went to guest services to redeem it did not work
We then went back down to the check in desk and they offered us another room which was like the first one we had
The front desk service was beyond expectations
After speaking with the hotel staff they were rude and blameful

Wish that the registration clerk at check in would have done better job explaining how the 25 room credit worked apparently it could have been used for room service as well as restaurant or cafe worked out though after getting answers from text concierge service I recommend concierge text service highly as it was very responsive and kept us free from having to wait in line for answers to our questions
I called the front desk who sent security because it was a non dog room and no one answered
Almost every single staff member that we interacted with was rude
This is terrible service in my opinion and I would not stay at this hotel again
The comment made all weekend was that it was a holiday weekend and everywhere was short staffed
It was great to get good service especially because we were there just as so many things had to be closed due to COVID19
Room service was a 2 hour wait time and the room was never cleaned daily

then there was a white powdery substance I am guessing a drug you snort on our coffee table then we were the witnesses to a bad manger employee conversation happening in our hall way about how they were forced to sign paperwork about being laid off the girl was crying it was nt the best moment and should have been happening not in a hallway
My husband called to advise and he thought that the staff would have made a little extra things in our room
The bathroom had a TV in built in the mirror ours was not working I brought this up to reception multiple times but they never bothered to fix it
Parking was easy we did nt have to walk a mile through confusing parking structures and hotel corridors it was a quick walk to the front desk from our car
There seemed to be loads of staff and security about
By the time we were due to leave everything had closed even the room servicing
